sentence: A man tried to sell me a coffin today. i said, thats the last thing i need.
explanation: A coffin is a box or container for a dead body, used in funerals.
first_new_sentence: I need a sturdy coffin to bury my beloved pet.
second_new_sentence: The artist carved the coffin out of fine oak wood.

sentence: A plateau is the highest form of flattery. thats it...
explanation: A plateau is an area of relatively level high ground.
first_new_sentence: The plateau provided a stunning view of the valley below.
second_new_sentence: The company reached a plateau in its sales growth this quarter.

sentence: Caught my dog chewing on my law books this morning. now he is pro bono.
explanation: Pro bono is a term used for professional work undertaken voluntarily and without payment.
first_new_sentence: The lawyer offered his services pro bono to help the homeless.
second_new_sentence: Her pro bono work has greatly impacted the community.

sentence: Did you hear about the horse that got shot? hes in stable condition.
explanation: A stable is a building for the lodging of horses.

sentence: Why are 90 degree angles so cocky? because they are always right
